elements.text: When you hold a weapon and sing a keen for those it has killed, roll +heart. On a strong hit, the wielder inflicts +1 harm when they *Strike* or *Clash*. If they roll a 1 on their action die when making a move to inflict harm, the magic is spent. On a weak hit, as above, but the voices of those who were slain join in your song; *Endure Stress* (2 stress).
As above, and the wielder may also (one time only) add +1 and take +2 momentum on a hit when they *Draw the Circle*, *Enter the Fray*, or *Battle*.
When you perform this ritual, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
